channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- M-Files Web
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- M-Files Web

item.title: CVE-2022-4270|2024-08-28T20:01:20.356Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Incorrect privilege assignment issue in M-Files Web in M-Files Web versions before 22.5.11436.1 could have changed permissions accidentally.

item.title: CVE-2023-2325|2024-08-28T20:06:58.799Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Stored XSS Vulnerability in M-Files Classic Web versions before 23.10 and LTS Service Release Versions before 23.2 LTS SR4 and 23.8 LTS SR1allows attacker to execute script on users browser via stored HTML document.

item.title: CVE-2022-4264|2024-08-28T20:00:42.953Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Incorrect Privilege Assignment in M-Files Web (Classic) in M-Files before 22.8.11691.0 allows low privilege user to change some configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-3406|2024-08-28T18:29:05.426Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Path Traversal issue in M-Files Classic Web versions below 23.6.12695.3 and LTS Service Release Versions before 23.2 LTS SR3 allows authenticated user to read some restricted files on the web server
